QuestData.Title: Abrogator Arbitrator
QuestData.Description: Da bums in Highmaul refuse to see dey are on da way out. Me, I'm gettin' while da gettin' is good. Da sooner youse bring me a bunch of Apexis Crystals, da sooner I can get off dis stupid island. Da amount required is very precise!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kluk'kluk wants you to bring him $1oa Apexis Crystals.
